price: (20) And We have made for you therein means of living and [for] those for whom you are not providers.[672]
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا لَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَعَٰيِشَ وَمَن لَّسۡتُمۡ لَهُۥ بِرَٰزِقِينَ
footnotes: [672]- Allāh has put at your service other men and animals for which He provides.  An additional meaning is that Allāh provides means for your living and for all other creatures as well.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnā lakum fīhā maʿāyisha waman lastum lahu birāziqīna
